description: Triangle T read by rows: row n consists of the numbers C(n,2)+1 to C(n+1,2); numbers in odd-numbered places form a decreasing sequence and the others an increasing sequence.
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
crossrefs: Reflection of the array in A057027 about its central column, a permutation of the natural numbers.
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 28, 2000
